data.description: From its décor to the excellent international selections, everything about The Reef suggests elegance. Located along the scenic East Coast Road in Chennai, away from the bustle of the city, Sheraton Grand Chennai Resort and Spa's new restaurant is perfect to head off to for a relaxed meal.

data.description: It’s a fusion of kebabs and global cuisine. It’s the marriage of the open kitchen with a vibrant dining ambience – to engage your senses, even before you begin your meal; a meal that's tailored to your taste by our talented Chef’s team and his team. From kebabs and grills to a range of appetizers, our chefs themselves serve you your first course.

data.name: C Salt

photo.caption: We are extremely pleased and proud to announce that your #favourite #beach side #restaurant "CSalt"  is #ranked number. 2 in #Chennai & #Mahabalipuram, Tamil Nadu, on Tripadvisor.

data.description: Spread across 25,000 square feet, C Salt has a rustic and pleasant ambience with comfortable seating and captivating music that elevates the overall dining experience. The specially curated ‘sea to plate’ fresh seafood menu reflects the personal notes on what comes out of the coastal belt of Southern India, with a focus on locally sourced ingredients and flavours. This theme flows across the menu
data.address: 280, East Coast Rd, Chennai (Madras) 603104 India

data.name: Avartana
data.description: Avartana exemplifies an exclusive blend of traditional and progressive renditions of Southern Indian cuisine, which is rooted to the gravitas of the unique tastes, aromas and flavours of southern Indian spices. The Southern Indian Peninsula is unified by the region’s bounty of pepper and spices. Our offerings forge this unity and encompass a range of specially crafted tasting menus for discerning diners, who may choose to enjoy the pleasures of savouring an array of delicacies crafted by our chefs. Pronounced ‘avartan’, the word Avartana means rhythm, iteration, mysticism and magic. As the restaurant seeks to represent a new interpretation of South Indian cuisine in contemporary renditions, the name Avartana encapsulates the intention of offering different iterations that revolve around this unique cuisine. Presenting Southern Indian cuisine- reinvented and redefined

data.description: Unwind with friends after a day of excitement in Velachery. Our signature sports bar and restaurant is located on the first floor, and showcases distinctive pub-like furnishings. After a busy day in Chennai, stop by for a craft cocktail or cold beer. Timings: Monday to Saturday: 3:00PM to 2:00AM Sunday: 3:00PM to 12:00AM

data.name: Winchester Bar
data.description: Winchester Bar is a luxurious colonial-bar that is the best of both the worlds as it takes that extra mile to give you a soothing experience and amazing offerings. Located in Egmore, Winchester Bar takes the party animal in you to a next level. The larger than life ambiance paired up with a magnificent bar that serves an array of wines, fine spirits, and cocktails instantly lightens up your mood. The lip-smacking Finger Food is well-served to go with the spirits that you cannot afford to miss. To add to your experience, the place has a considerate staff that pushes the envelope every time it feels the need to.

data.name: The Great Kabab Factory
data.description: TGKF features an array of succulent kababs, both vegetarian and non-vegetarian, along with a rich selection of breads. The recipes combine ancient with the contemporary, showcasing delectable kababs from all over the Indian subcontinent. The restaurant offers a memorable style of service and décor that creates an authentic and eclectic ambiance. TGKF is open for lunch and dinner every day. Service is table d'hôte and is unlimited. Complementing the food is a wide range of choice beverages, ensuring that you'll take home a wholesome gourmet experience.

data.description: Peshawri, one of ITC Hotels' signature culinary brands serves authentic cuisine from India's North West Frontier with it's community style dining and the concept of eating with your fingers. Showcasing the art of the tandoor with an assortment of flat breads combined with slow-cooked lentils, vegetables and meats exalted by freshly ground condiments, these signature dishes prepared in the restaurant's display kitchen are renowned for its robust flavours brought alive in simple elegance.

data.description: Ottimo Cucina Italiana is an endeavour to entice the palate with delectable and authentic flavours from Italy. This exquisite Italian Ristorante features a magnificently large live kitchen which puts our Chefs skills on display where additionally you can treat yourself by watching your feast being prepared in front of you. Take your pick from wood fired pizzas, elaborate antipasti and a variety of artisanal pastas and cheeses, not to mention grappa at the exclusive grappa bar and select wines from the wine anoteca.

data.name: Broken Bridge Cafe Indian Restaurant by Radioroom
data.description: We all remember the Broken Bridge for the memories created there. It was a space where one could do nothing yet end up with some of the most unforgettable moments of their life. Broken Bridge Cafe aims to bring back the good old days;A restaurant creating more such memories now centered around some innovative, lip-smacking kebabs,pizza and better company.Broken bridge cafe is an all day dining restaurant/cafe serving great indian kebabs,desi pizza with fusion or a twist.Broken bridge cafe serves breakfast,lunch,dinner with outdoor seating,kids play area,family friendly,good for group bookings,private parties,birthday celebrations with food and liquor.Our specialities are Kebabs,Desi pizzas and would be the best indian restaurant near by

A place that serves simple, honest and sharing style all day eats with cold pressed juicery and a dedicated beverage program. Comfort food that celebrates regional Indian cuisine and influences from pan orient. A non-alcoholic beverage program to inspire and simplify healthy living, a place for better-for-you specialty beverages from cold pressed juices to Indian teas and tisanes to great quality coffees. The design and service creates an environment that is relaxed, fun, casual and welcoming.

data.name: Southern Spice
data.description: The Taj Coromandel experience is enhanced by its world famous cuisines served up by some of the best Indian and International chefs. Taj Coromandel offers three distinctive specialty restaurants - Prego, the Italian Fine Dining restaurant; Southern Spice, the traditional South Indian cuisine restaurant serving the cuisines of the four southern states of India; Golden Dragon, the Signature Chinese restaurant of the Taj. Experience Global delights at the multi-cuisine, All Day Diner, Anise. Live it up at Chipstead, the Bar at Coromandel while sipping on unique cocktails or indulging in our collection of Single Malts and Cognacs. Authentic flavours, excellent service and welcoming ambience create a remarkable dining experience that is unrivalled anywhere else in Chennai.

data.name: The Flying Elephant
data.description: A bold culinary adventure designed to elevate, excite and electrify your senses. We like to call it 'fun dining'. The Flying Elephant is a multifaceted sensory exploration of recipes that go beyond culinary limits. An elevated adventure that pushes geographical and gastronomical boundaries and picks them apart with gusto. At the centre of this experience is a menu that brings together ideas, ingredients and techniques from across the world, leaving you enchanted, transformed and uplifted all at once. An exhilarating ride that blends food, beverage, music and entertainment. It's 'fun dining' designed and delivered by a team of professionals with an eye for detail and a penchant for discovering the undiscovered. And the best part? We’re just getting started.

data.name: Barbeque Nation
data.description: Barbeque Nation is one of the most successful casual dining restaurant chains in India. Our restaurants are spacious and well appointed with a lot of wood and open-brick wall surfaces to get you in the mood for a nice and relaxing evening with friends, colleagues or family members. The entire cuisine is a happy blend of American, Mediterranean, Oriental and Indian and is available in both vegetarian and non-vegetarian choices. Our unique 'live-grill' - embedded on your table - allow you and your friends to sit around it and experience the warmth of a barbeque party right at your table. You can grill your own starters in a choice of flavours - we provide you with the marinades and sauces - and enjoy them right off the grill! The buffet is full-course with a full complement of soups, salads, main dishes and desserts. A mindboggling selection of wines and liquor is available to put in the right spirits, literally! The music is peppy and hip and we have a classic range of rock, pop, and easy listening numbers for you to choose from. In some of our outlets we even have live DJs' to liven up the evening and get you in that party mood! The food and ambience are not the only reasons why people come to Barbeque Nation. It is the quality of our service that we take pride in and our chefs and waiters are trained to go all out to make your Barbeque Nation experience memorable. Feel free to ask them for any special requests that you might have and they will strive to address it as promptly and efficiently as possible. Finally, we have no surprises for you when it comes to the bill. We have a pre-fixed price and you only pay that, and nothing else! The entire range of starters on the live-grill, the soups, salads, main courses and desserts are all included. This helps you plan both your party and your budget and makes the experience hassle-free. So, just bring over your friends, colleagues or loved ones and have a wonderful and carefree time at Barbeque Nation.

Our menu offers a carefully curated selection of standard options as well as daily specials. Upstairs, the Amethyst boutique showcases some of India's leading designers across textiles, jewellery, accessories and accents for the home. Bloom, the flower shop, has an exotic and beautiful range of flowers and foliage. Amethyst offers an entire shopping and dining experience.

data.name: Tuscana Pizzeria
data.description: "A classic wood fired pizzeria created by Vipin Sachdev & Chef Willi brings the very best of authentic Italian food to the city. Tucked away in the upcoming area of Khader Nawaz Khan, we offer thin crust wood fired pizza with 4 different bases- Classic refined wheat, Whole wheat, Multigrain and Gluten free, presented in rustic wooden platter which adds originality to a flavorful experience. Our pizzeria is complemented by the addition of delectable risottos and inviting pastas, where we also offer a range of eggless, homemade and gluten free options. The trophy tiramisu is just one of our many devoured desserts, which complemented by an espresso is the perfect end to an authentic savored Italian experience. The Tuscana team extends a warm welcome to you and we hope you give us the honor of unleashing your taste buds while we delightfully serve you. "
data.address: 19,Wallace Garden 3rd Street Nungambakkam, Chennai (Madras) 600006 India

data.name: Absolute Barbecue - T-Nagar, Chennai
data.description: AB's is India's First WISH GRILL Restaurant. A place designed to take the adventure, excitement and joy of BARBECUING to all new heights. A place dedicated to you and your favourite people in the world - your GANGS. Where your job is to WISH. And ours is to make your wishes come TRUE - in unprecedented, flavour-packed, deliciously delightful ways! Why? ... Because what you like is more important than printed menus. ... Because you have a million moods and there should always be food to match. ... Because grillin' is not a way of cooking food, it's a way of life. ... Because taste counts; and you matter.
data.address: 45 Gopathy Narayanswamy Chetty Road Tower Victorie, 3rd Floor, T Nagar, Chennai (Madras) 600017 India

data.name: The Raintree
data.description: Finding the perfect blend of spices is a skill, making Chettinad cuisine one of the most skilful in its preparation. Chettinad dishes revolve around mutton, chicken and fish and are less fiery and more about the use of cinnamon, cumin and star anise. Traditions here are still alive, and well. And those forgotten are brought to life into fine-dine dishes of the highest calibre. They’re passionate and personal, authentic and artistic. And all for you to discover and devour, al fresco style, surrounded by a lush green canopy.
